title: Google Podcast App Error
content:
I am posting my question in this forum because I'm unable to find any support path for the Google Podcast app (besides sending "in-app" feedback).  I am running a Pixel 4 with the most recent system software (April 2020 security update) and the most recent version of the Google Podcast app.

When I try to play podcasts (any podcast; from the Daily, to This American Life, to Post Reports, etc.)...I get the following message:  "Something went wrong. This episode couldn't be played.  Please try again later."

I have determined that it only happens with episodes that I have downloaded.  But of course I almost always am listening away from WIFI; so always want to download.  I considered it as a storage issue but I have 16 GB free.  

Could anyone point me to where I might get support?  Thanks much!
